price: "Que deseja fazer-vos sair de vossa terra." Disse Faraó: "Então, que ordenais?"
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
